subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji|grade=|rs=人03}}

subSections.title: Readings
Usage notes
subSections.text: This character is not used much in modern Japanese.

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text: Alternative spelling of {{ja-l|杖||tsue}}. See that entry for details.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|つえ|hhira=つゑ}}

# {{alternative spelling of|ja|sort=つえ|杖||a [[cane]], a [[crook]], a [[walking stick]]}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text: Alternative spelling of {{ja-l|兵||tsuwamono}}. See that entry for details.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|つわもの|hhira=つはもの}}

# {{alternative spelling of|ja|sort=つわもの|兵||[[weaponry]]; a [[soldier]], a [[warrior]]; a [[courageous]] person, a [[brave]]; someone who is very [[confident]], even [[obstinate]]}}

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text: Alternative spelling of {{ja-l|回り}}, {{ja-l|周り}}, {{ja-l|廻り||mawari}}. See those entries for details.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|まわり|hhira=まはり}}

# {{alternative spelling of|ja|sort=まわり|回り}}, etc.: [[surroundings]]; [[around]]; [[turning]]

subSections.title: Etymology 4
subSections.text: From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しょう'}} {{m|ltc|仗}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|仗|tr=zhàng}}.
